item.description:
Thursday, April 28, 2011  Price: $25                                                                          Register: http://tbncorporatetransitions.eventbrite.com/ Refreshments provided

5:00 to 8:00pm

500 Technology Square

First Floor Conference Room

Cambridge, MA 02139 

 

Corporate Transitions: 

Navigating Through the Life Sciences Life Cycle

 

Scott Chizzo, President & Chief Consultant, Maxiom Group

 

Life Science companies are defined by their ability to transition through distinct phases of their life cycle.  Movement from discovery to clinical development to commercial and beyond brings unique challenges and opportunities.

 

This presentation will introduce the concept of Corporate Transitions; the unique challenges faced at each stage of the life cycle, and introduce a framework for planning and implementing enterprise transformation. Topics will include:

  • Enterprise transformation: overall perspective - business overlay of top of science
  • Future state visioning: What will we look like in the future? - people, process technology
  • Capabilities: Linking vision to specific needs - ways for employees to adapt to new realities and capabilities including
  • Transition planning framework and tools - skill sets needed, role of cross functional teams
  • A review of certifications that enable coorporate transitions including: Project Management, Life Sciences Industry Knowledge, Facilitation Skills and OE Concepts and Tools

AGENDA

5:00 to 6:00 Networking & Refreshments

6:00 to 7:00 Presentation

7:00 to 7:30 Discussion and Q&A

7:30 to 8:00 Networking
item.name: Corporate Transitions: Navigating Through the Life Sciences Life Cycle
